message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DC, cs.SY, cs.DS 

This paper proposes a method for distributing machine learning tasks, specifically the best arm identification task, among multiple devices. This falls under the category of reinforcement learning and multi-agent systems, which are covered in cs.LG and cs.AI. The paper also discusses communication costs and scalability, which are relevant to distributed computing (cs.DC) and systems and control (cs.SY). Finally, the experiments conducted involve analyzing data, which is a key aspect of data structures and algorithms (cs.DS).
